Class FuzzyLogic

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.computing.ai.fuzzy.FuzzyLogic
public class FuzzyLogic extends Object
Basic fuzzy logic engine.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
